column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I visited a big garden nursery store and picked out a tree to plant in my garden .
#id=2
#text=I wanted to pick out a tree that was a good size for my garden space .
#id=3
#text=I picked out a tree that was green and healthy .
#id=4
#text=The tree was n't too big so I brought it home in a pot .
#id=5
#text=I also bought a shovel and a bag of potting soil .
#id=6
#text=In my garden at home , I began digging a hole in the soil with my shovel to fit my tree .
#id=7
#text=I picked a spot to plant it where I think it would get the most exposure to sunlight to grow .
#id=8
#text=I planted the tree in the hole and then shoveled the fresh new soil into the hole to hold the tree up .
#id=9
#text=The fresh new soil will be good for the tree to grow instead of using the old soil .
#text=I watered the tree and soil and now I will wait for it to flourish in my garden .
